name: Prototype - VR Locomotion
description:
This is a demo implementation of a Smooth Locomotion Character Controller. It can be used to test different configurations of speed, acceleration and other input options.

Vive Controls:

Left trackpad click+move: Move around
Right trackpad click left/right: Snap turn
Menu button: Open movement options UI
Trigger: Grab items


Oculus Controls:

Left thumbstick: Move around
Right thumbstick left/right: Snap turn
B/Y: Open movement options UI
Trigger: Grab items


Index Controls:

Left thumbstick: Move around
Right thumbstick left/right: Snap turn
B: Open movement options UI
Trigger: Grab items
